snippet.title: Curious Expedition 2: Highlands of Avalon DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the DLC now: https://s.team/a/1690330/

The Highlands of Avalon DLC features a brand new island type (the Highlands) with new tile types, items, locations, enemies, recruitable characters and more. Once the DLC is activated it will expand possibilities across the entire game, both in Campaign Mode and Director Mode.

Curious Expedition 2 is out now on Steam: https://s.team/a/1040230/

Also available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/curious-expedition-2-switch/

Coming to Playstation and Xbox in early 2022. 

Join our Discord server: https://discord.gg/maschinen-mensch

Official website: https://curious-expedition.com

Published by Thunderful: https://www.thunderfulgames.com

Trailer by Nomi: https://www.thenomi.com/
